attributes.action: Guarantee the UK citizenship of EU nationals living in the UK
attributes.background:
People who migrated from the EU to the UK who live, work, and have families here have not been guaranteed citizenship following the democratic decision for the UK to leave the EU.

These people are British in all ways other than birthplace, and are not the Theresa May's political bargaining chips.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/182723
